title: LA Gadget Expo
desc: Love gadgets? You're in luck! Join us for the inaugural LA Gadget Expo on December 5th and 6th at the Reef in Downtown Los Angeles. Get some holiday shopping done, play with some cool gadgets, and enjoy some amazing food. There are gadgets of all kinds, including: For more information, please visit: www.lagadgetexpo.com ? Tickets are $10 pre-sale, $15 at the door.
